website_summaries.verdict: A durable, roomy bag for those who want to carry a few extra supplies to class and look fabulous doing it.
pros: Fits standard size and thick mats up to 26" wide
Canvas exterior with cotton blend lining
Outer pocket is perfect for keys, cell phone, and other small personal items
Room for blanket and water bottle
cons: Doesn't hold the largest of mats, so measure carefully before ordering

customer_reviews.title: Wow!
customer_reviews.text: At first I was so disappointed that my Manduka Pro didn't fit in this bag, but after I rolled it up tightly, it fit like a glove with room for my block strap and more! I'm so glad I didn't return this bag. Great quality. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Anastasiya

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Very beautiful bag, unfortunately mine is opening up at the seams with less than 2 months of using it Update: thankfully they promptly let me return a month after my "return" time expired. I will try getting another one
customer_reviews.author: elle

customer_reviews.title: The bag is beautiful and well made
customer_reviews.text: The bag is beautiful and well made. I love the design and it does not look cheap at all. However, it can not hold a Manduka Pro or eco mat well. I struggled to fit my Manduka mat in the bag. You have to roll the mat tightly to fit it in and no way you can accommodate a block after you put the mat in. However, people who have normal mats like Gaiam will find it easy to accommodate a mat and 2 blocks (may be even a towel). I would have given it a 5 star had they made it 2 inches longer
customer_reviews.author: amukherjee

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful celestial yoga bag!
customer_reviews.text: I love my new yoga bag. I got the Celestial pattern. It fits my 24 inches Jade Harmony yoga mat, 2 blocks, a micro fleece towel, yoga outfit and a pair of sneakers for when I want to go running before/after my class. A Note: it will also fit my 26 inches Manduka Pro with everything else aforementioned minus the sneakers. The material and stitching feel sturdy and expensive. I've been carrying my mat, blocks, purse separately for two years! I have no idea how having everything in one bag makes life so much more efficient and organized!!! Get this bag!
customer_reviews.author: phuong tran

customer_reviews.title: Yoga Mat Duffel Bag Carrier
customer_reviews.text: This bag is just as adorable in person as online. It is exactly as described. Large enough to fit my yoga mat and a foam roller and a yoga black and strap. Def large enough to fit 2 yoga mats side by side. Zippers work great, love the little zipper pocket on the front to put my keys/wallet/phone. Great purchase! I'm very happy! I would totally recommend this yoga mat duffle as an alternative to the usual yoga mat bags or yoga mat straps! Definitely a cool gym bag!
customer_reviews.author: Bee Chu :)

customer_reviews.title: Great looking bag but not durable
customer_reviews.text: Wife is a yoga instructor and bought this bag for her this Christmas. Loved the design and size received several compliments but the handle stitching did not last a month. I get she is an instructor and hard on bags, mats, etc. but was hoping it would last a little longer than a month.
customer_reviews.author: SA- Denver, CO

customer_reviews.title: Bag wasn't too small & they charged shipping to return
customer_reviews.text: I would've rated 4 stars but the fact that I was charged shipping to return the product was a big turn off, especially since I didn't pay shipping when I bought it. Had I known that I would not have bought the bag to begin with. Buyers beware. As far as the bag goes it is a nice pattern, the elephants are very yogi spirited. It only fits a standard mat and nothing much else. I wanted a bag to hold all my yoga stuff (mat, blocks, strap, towel) and this bag does not allow for that. The fabric was sturdy, nice and appeared to be of good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Jacyntiles

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I’m getting ready to start my yoga teacher training and was looking for a yoga bag that would carry my mat, towels, headbands, yoga socks, essential oils and crystals. Totally the bag for that!! The color is rich and the material is durable. the zipper is very thick and strong. The arm handles are a good length. I would design it a little more giving. Overall very satisfied and happy with the purchase. The charity donation also inspires me to spread the word about the purpose of this foundation. Amazing work! KINDFOLK you have my continued support! Great job on making this world a better place. Namaste
customer_reviews.author: SueFish

customer_reviews.title: Cute and functional!
customer_reviews.text: I just got the standard yoga bag in the karma pattern. Let me just say that the moment I took it out of the package it looked a bit small. But then I tried fitting in my new manduka pro mat, and it really did fit! I had to double check the reviews because for a moment there it didn’t seem like it would fit. Overall, the print is nice, it’s lightweight, cute, and I can’t wait to use it for going to my daily yoga classes. I will have to update this in the future to see if it holds up. Also, I am just using it for storing my yoga mat, small towel, and car keys.
customer_reviews.author: Kimy

customer_reviews.title: Fully functional with plenty of room for accessories
customer_reviews.text: Just started using this bag and really like it. Different than other yoga bags- this one has straps that fit easily over the shoulder and don't drag you down. I have a jade yoga mat and a yoga blanket that fit easily into the bag with room to spend. It has a pocket in the front for keys, wallet, phone etc. I am short (5'2") and don't find this bag big and overwhelming. The print is nice and the fabric and hardware are very good quality. If you want to carry more than your mat I highly recommend this yoga carrier.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer JM

customer_reviews.title: Great Mat Bag if you need a larger bag
customer_reviews.text: Love the material pattern. The material is very sturdy, the zipper is also really sturdy, it also makes the bag a bit on the heavy side. I've got a Manduka Pro, it fits but I've got to make sure it's rolled pretty tightly and then have to put it in sideways. The bag would be better if it were about 2-3" longer. The handles are well made and study. I would buy it again, but only if I couldn't find the same bag that was just a bit longer.
customer_reviews.author: R Briggs

customer_reviews.title: Great Yoga Bag
customer_reviews.text: Love this yoga bag because of the pattern as well as fitting my Jade Yoga Mat, my knee pad, my wipes and a pocket for my sunglasses and keys. Easy to store in my trunk and carry everything in. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Janiene

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: Everyone loves it! I have the elephant bag. My grandchildren love the pattern. My husband loves I can put my yoga stuff away. I haven’t been going many places to do yoga with COVID but when I go outside or travel this is a nice bag to take my oversized, thick mat and two blocks in. Now I’m not constantly looking for the blocks in the car wondering where they went to after we travel!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super Cute - Perfect Size
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely cute and functional yoga bag. Perfect to fit my mat hand cushions and more. Absolutely love it. It arrived super quick, in excellent condition and just as described in picture and description - highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kimba

customer_reviews.title: Love this bag!
customer_reviews.text: This bag fits my Manduka Pro mat, my towel, and water bottle without problem. Room for more. The pattern is cool and seems to be sturdy/well made. So happ with purchase from this great seller! Namaste.
customer_reviews.author: Sandee Delano

customer_reviews.title: Not enough pockets/dividers
customer_reviews.text: I gave 4 stars for sturdiness bc I havent used it much yet and dont know its going to hold up in day to day. I didnt give 5 stars bc there are not enough pockets. It can hold lots of things, but there arent enough pockets or dividers to keep it organized and separate. Very pretty bag, look forward to showing it off!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Chandler

customer_reviews.title: I'M RETURNING IT BUT YOU WON'T REGRET GETTING THIS BAG
customer_reviews.text: Even though I'm returning this bag I felt I had to give a review. It's beautiful and I really love it. Great quality looks awesome. Really spacious. It can fit two thick blocks, a mat. Strap. Yoga towel. Face towel. Water bottle. And even a small bottle of mat cleaner spray. Well at least I was able to. I mean it's just fabulous. I wish I didn't have to return it but right after I got it I got upgraded to a 27 inch mat which unfortunately is too wide for this bag. But if your mat is smaller you will not regret getting this bag ☺ enjoy!! Oh and the front pocket could fit my purse. 👛
customer_reviews.author: Book Lover

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and functional bag
customer_reviews.text: This bag easily holds a yoga mat, yoga blanket, small meditation cushion and still has room for a few extra things. I bought the XL size with the Celestial pattern. It is well made, beautiful and highly functional. While roomy, it's not too big or heavy, so I can carry it around comfortably. I'm so glad I bought it. The shipping was very fast and the seller had great follow up to make sure I liked the bag. I highly recommend this 5-star product and seller.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie Bartolo

customer_reviews.title: Love, Love, Love This Yoga Bag
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this bag a couple of months back and absolutely loved it. Then I bought a larger mat and found I could not fit my new mat along with my accessories which were two blankets, two blocks and a belt so I returned it and ordered a bag that was a little larger....but I never loved my new bag as much as this one and my new bag did not hold all my accessories either so....I reordered this bag which I still love and I have also received many positive comments about it from friends and classmates.
customer_reviews.author: P. J. G.

customer_reviews.title: Love this bag - I have two kindfolk bags (the ...
customer_reviews.text: Love this bag - I have two kindfolk bags (the other is the one with the straps for a spare mat on the sides, also from amazon) I love them both but this one is the only one my Manduka Pro fits in! I cant fits much else in there with it but for the most part the studios I go to have blocks etc right there so it doesnt really matter.
customer_reviews.author: ALSG

customer_reviews.title: Zipper seems problematic
customer_reviews.text: Like the bag, price fine, really like style and fabric. HOWEVER, I am concerned about the zippers. They seem like they will not last long, which is odd because they appear to be heavy duty, but I have a question about their installation. Have yet to carry the bag, but noticed at delivery that the zippers were stiff, seemed hesitant, as though they were sticking on something which leads me to believe that it is the construction/installation which may be in question. I need the bag, so I will carry it this week, but have reservations about the zipper life. Hopefully I will find this not to be a problem
customer_reviews.author: LouWho

customer_reviews.title: Not as nice in person as online
customer_reviews.text: Not as nice in person as online. The colors and deaigb looks childish, the colors don't stay within the lines and blead. I don't recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Emma Rentz

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Yoga Bag
customer_reviews.text: I love this yoga may bag. The one I have is not the extra large size, but it still fits a thick yoga mat, my yoga strap, and two yoga blocks, although more often, I use it to carry my mat, strap, and a change of clothes. The fabric has a thick, high-end feel to it. I have received compliments on its awesome pattern. I'm very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Upper_Echelon

customer_reviews.title: Awesome & Roomy Yoga Bag
customer_reviews.text: I chose this bag in the extra large size paisley color and it's so very pretty. It's so roomy!!! It fits my Gaiam mat, two blocks, water bottle, strap, thin blanket, 10x8 Soka knee pad and towel with room to spare. Like others have said I do wish the outside pocket was wider but I still love this bag. It's nice to be able to carry all my yoga stuff in just bag one versus my mat in one bag and everything else in another. I highly recommend and would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: E. Grier

customer_reviews.title: Not big enough for my Manduka mat
customer_reviews.text: The bag is sturdy, a beautiful color, and has a zipper from one side to the other. This bag is described as "fits standard size & think mats" but while I think the bag would easily accommodate a thin yoga mat, blocks, and a strap, sorrowfully it doesn't accommodate my thick Manduka mat plus yoga props. I wish I had read the other reviews for this product before ordering mine. I see Kindfolk now has an extra large size bag.
customer_reviews.author: MBernhard

customer_reviews.title: Cute!
customer_reviews.text: I love the bag, it's super cute. Just as it is pictured and described. The handles are really nice and sturdy which I appreciate because I'm able to put everything I take to the studio in one bag. I was a little skeptical that I would be able to fit much else in there with my yoga mat but it proved me wrong. I can fit my small purse, a couple sets of clothes and my water bottle in there easily with still extra space.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful bag BUT smaller than expected
customer_reviews.text: This bag is beautiful and I anticipate that I will receive many compliments on it. However, I thought it was going to be a bit larger. If it was a bit longer and a bit wider, it would be a five star product. Slightly disappointed that it is a tight squeeze to fit my yoga essentials - my mat, block and strap.
customer_reviews.author: Caryl

customer_reviews.title: Lovely Purchase
customer_reviews.text: This was delivered very quickly. It's really pretty. I've had many compliments on it. I fit my mat, 2 blocks and a towel in there with no problem. If I have a criticism, it would be that they opted to use a brown zipper in it. It's black and white, so I would have preferred a black zipper. But with that said, I would buy it again. It is functional and useful, as all possessions should be.
customer_reviews.author: Noradora

customer_reviews.title: You can’t beat this quality and this price!
customer_reviews.text: Love my bag! So easy to carry all my yoga essentials in and know I can just grab and go. The elephant print is perfect and I loved that it came with additional small bag to keep the small items (mat cleaning spray, chapstick, Small sweat towel and hair ties) so they are not just floating around the bag.
customer_reviews.author: Kjerst

customer_reviews.title: Great bag!
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag! It holds my mat, two blocks, and strap easily. The pocket holds my phone and keys easily as well. Nice looking and well made!
customer_reviews.author: Ri

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful but fades
customer_reviews.text: Great bag. I never we got the bag it said it came with and you can’t get a hold of anyone to get it so if you buy it with the offer for a small second bag. Good luck. I got this after another lady o class had one similar. Do not wash she did and it faded and looks very worn. Mine has started to fad since it’s a gym bag and it’s left in my car sometimes.
customer_reviews.author: Cristina Salazar

customer_reviews.title: Love this bag!
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for one of my daughters-in-law and she simply loves it! If I were to buy myself a bag like this, I would definitely but one from "Kindfold", which is, I believe, the name of the company I purchased it from! The quality of the bag is phenomenal & the colors were true, right on, and, very pleasing to the eye!
customer_reviews.author: Jean

customer_reviews.title: Great bag
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag, it's as beautiful as the picture. It holds my mat, two blocks, my strap and a change of clothes with no problem at all.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Great bag to tote all your yoga gear
customer_reviews.text: I attend many different yoga classes and never know what equipment the instructor is going to ask us to whip out. I was pleased to find this tote that is long enough to hold my mat, plus two blocks, strap, my wedge, and a blanket; and still zip closed. I really like the print as well. If I'm not too rough on it, I think it will last for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Monica Leone

customer_reviews.title: Solid bag with plenty of room
customer_reviews.text: I was a little disappointed by the colors when I opened this... not quite as bright and vivid as advertised. And I was under the impression there was another pocket inside. But overall its a great bag. Big enough for a mat, towel, blocks, and a strap.
customer_reviews.author: Jessie

customer_reviews.title: a must buy!
customer_reviews.text: My absolute favorite bag. I am an instructor, and this bag holds my mat, strap, block, notebook and even a few articles of clothing. it is not bulky though! This bag is really durable and I get compliments on the pattern all the time. so great! I Have a Jade Harmony Mat and it fits it like a dream.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa Statz

customer_reviews.title: Perfect yoga bag!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this yoga mat bag in the elephant parade print and absolutely adore it. The fabric quality and zippers are so nice and durable. This bag will hold my mat, blocks, and straps easily with room left for a light blanket or throw. There is plenty of room in the side zip pocket for your phone, keys, cash etc. I highly recommend this bag and plan to purchase for one of my yogi friends for Christmas. You will not be disappointed! Namaste
customer_reviews.author: shimmygirl

customer_reviews.title: Envy of my piyo class!!!
customer_reviews.text: Envy of my piyo class. Lots of compliments and some even got their own. Easy to Cary EVERYTHING you need!!! Lightweight, yet great handles for easy carrying!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great, and good size!
customer_reviews.text: I have a large cork mat and it fits perfectly in this bag, along with a strap and couple small things. If you had a normal sized mat, I'm sure you could also fit your blocks in it too. Beautiful pattern, looks cool, and I highly recommend. The material doesn't seem overly strong/durable, so I wouldn't use it for too much travel or stuffing too many things in it, but it works for the purpose I need (carrying it gently from place to place).
customer_reviews.author: Ally C.

customer_reviews.title: Great Bag for Manduka Mats.
customer_reviews.text: Great bag, read some reviews on this bag that it was to short for manduka mats...but I have every manduka from 73" to 81" and from 4mm 6mm thick and of them fit in here with tons of room to spare. It fits the manduka pro, eko 81" and grp.
customer_reviews.author: Char Char

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful bag
customer_reviews.text: This bag is beautiful and well made. I get so many compliments and it sounds stupid to say but it motivates me to practice because I love carrying it. I wish the straps were just a few inches longer so it could be shouldered better but otherwise awesome product. Mine can hold a mat, large and small towels, two blocks, a strap and more. The outside pocket is perfect for keys and a phone.
customer_reviews.author: Jodi

customer_reviews.title: Everything fits!
customer_reviews.text: I hated having to lug around my mat in one bag and all my other accessories (yoga towel, blocks, strap, water bottle...) in another bag. Now everything fits inside one cute bag! I can't really say how durable it is since I've only been using it for just over a month but so far, I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Janelle

customer_reviews.title: ... yoga mat - had read others' reviews that strongly recommended this bag so purchased
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a new yoga bag that would accommodate the length of a new Manduka yoga mat - had read others' reviews that strongly recommended this bag so purchased. It is perfect!! I was so tired of folding up my mat & towel (from hot yoga) to fit in shorter bags. I can now just drop it in. The zippers going down the ends of the bag are a real help putting in soaking wet mat/towels after a session. Definitely recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: Large bag, perfect for traveling yogis!
customer_reviews.text: This bag has a zipper all the way across the top and makes it extremely easy for me to fit my extra thick mat, blanket, yoga strap, yoga mat cleaner w/cloth and block with ease. The bag is beautiful and true to the color of the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Miss. Julie

customer_reviews.title: Lovely and Practical!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my yoga gear, but also perfect for my love of loveliness!
customer_reviews.author: Lenny Lyn

customer_reviews.title: Elegant, Adequate bag
customer_reviews.text: Love the Karma colors, fabric and zipper. Only thing I am going to add is a longer strap to sling onto shoulder when I want to. And there's no water bottle pocket, but it fits inside...The pocket fits phone and keys, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Jan Dennis

customer_reviews.title: Great if you carry a standard yoga mat, but not a 1 inch mat
customer_reviews.text: Love the bag,but unfortunately my 1inch thick yoga mat couldn't fit. Thankfully the x-large bag did fit, along with my straps. I wish that a bag was made to fit my size yoga mat + my blocks. Great quality though. In glad I ordered the bigger bag, it fits in my locker perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, well made and perfect size!
customer_reviews.text: Very well made, and this yoga bag is BIG enough for me to fit my yoga mat, towel, hand towel, my mid-size rumble roller cuz I roll my body before I stretch, my water bottle, and other incidentals. Anyone claiming it’s not BIG enough must have the biggest/thickest yoga mat ever made, LOL!!!
customer_reviews.author: Straight UP Straitz

customer_reviews.title: These bags make a statement!
customer_reviews.text: I have been carrying my Kindfolk yoga bag for over a year. Pleased to say five people asked me what brand and where did I get it. All five have made a purchase and are pleased. This purchase was one I ordered for a friend. Somehow we each chose a different pattern! The quality and patterns of the material are unique. Love the size and style. I'll continue to be a Kindfolk spokesperson....Cheer!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This bag makes me smile :)
customer_reviews.text: The zipper on my former yoga bag finally broke so I needed another one that was large enough to accommodate my wide, double mats. This bag is more than I could have hoped for. It is spacious and I love the print and material. The small zippered bag that came with it was a bonus and is a great size to contain my flexible bands.
customer_reviews.author: Ginger Klein

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this yoga bag. Very well constructed. It easily holds my mat and towel, plus my jacket and treadmill shoes. The little pocket is good for driver's license, phone, keys, money. So many compliments when I take it to the gym.
customer_reviews.author: L. Barlow

customer_reviews.title: Great yoga bag!
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag! It is different than what everyone else has and I have received so many compliments. Everyone wants to know where I got it. I like that it opens on the top and it fits my 74 inch Jade Fusion mat and allows me to carry it comfortably over my shoulder without slipping. There is still extra room in the bag as well. I also like the zip pocket on the front which is perfect for my phone and keys.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry L. Barney

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful detail and sturdy handles
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this bag to take my yoga mat when I travel by plane. It is definitely roomy and the outer zip pocket will hold a smartphone, keys, etc. It is a little snug fitting a Manduka Pro mat (length wise) but it does fit, actually I could fit two if I stack them! Beautiful detail and sturdy handles. I haven't traveled with it just yet, but if will update my review if I find it doesn't hold up!
customer_reviews.author: BargainBetty

customer_reviews.title: Good size
customer_reviews.text: This is a fun yoga bag that fits everything I need! I am able to one standard size yoga mat, two blocks, one strap and a wipe down towel. Use it everyday to carry mat to class.
customer_reviews.author: Erin McKenna

customer_reviews.title: Nice big yoga bag
customer_reviews.text: Nice big yoga bag.The front pocket is large enough for keys and a phone. Bag holds std. size mat, non slip mat. 2 blocks with enough room to spare for clothes, water a towel or another mat. The fabric is not flimsy (kinda like backpack material) and it has a nice big lengthwise zipper.
customer_reviews.author: Jeaniem

customer_reviews.title: Very roomy bag
customer_reviews.text: I am so glad I purchased this because now I can bring my own blocks in with my mat. It's large enough for more things like a water bottle and a towel. I love the design on the bag. Very convenient and I wish I had bought it sooner. Very roomy and I carry a mat and blocks.
customer_reviews.author: Nan

customer_reviews.title: Great size
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a bag that would fit my mat and 2 blocks and this is perfect. There's room to spare for my wallet, strap, etc. I've only been using it for a week so I don't know how long it'll last but I'm happy with my purchase. It is a bit heavy though, I can feel the difference with this bag as opposed to my old one
customer_reviews.author: S. Chopra

customer_reviews.title: Great bag
customer_reviews.text: Attractive and well constructed. Fits yoga mat, and two blocks. I carry mat, one block, a towel, water bottle with room to spare. Pocket on the side for keys, phone. I very pleased with this bag.
customer_reviews.author: D. Medeiros

customer_reviews.title: Namaste!
customer_reviews.text: beautiful bag! large enough to hold a mat and all the "trimmings." I particularly like the fact that the straps are long enough to be shoulder straps, but short enough to be handles. Quick delivery!
customer_reviews.author: Woof Mum

customer_reviews.title: Amazing and really durable!
customer_reviews.text: This bag is absolutely amazing! I am so excited about this purchase and will definitely get another one to gift out to friends and family in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Katina Alexandria

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: This is such a great bag. When it first arrived I wasn't sure my mat would fit in it, but it fits two mats perfectly. I get compliments on the pattern and color constantly. It has a perfect sized pocket in the side for a phone and keys; plenty of room for mat cleaner or a block/ strap whatever you need. Love it! I held off on buying a yoga bag because I thought I didn't need one; now I just see I was waiting for the right one :)
customer_reviews.author: Christine Quattro

customer_reviews.title: Cute!
customer_reviews.text: Really loving this bag! I didn't expect it to be this roomy! The design is a definite plus too! Item arrived on time and I really appreciate how the seller sent updates of the shipment via email and even asked if it met my expectations. Couldn't be happier with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: itsjamiexx

customer_reviews.title: La La Love This Bag!!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this bag! It is sturdy, holds everything: 2 Yoga mats, 2 blocks, 1 strap, 1 water bottle, one Yoga towel. There is a front pocket for my keys and cellphone. The design is so pretty! Going to Yoga in style! Namaste!
customer_reviews.author: La Reina

customer_reviews.title: Useful but smaller than I was hoping
customer_reviews.text: I like it and use it but was hoping it would be larger so my yoga blocks could also fit in here. They do not which means I also must take yet another tote to hold them. Get compliments on the attractive pattern
customer_reviews.author: CL

customer_reviews.title: True to description
customer_reviews.text: I love my bag. It fits a decent size yoga mat with some room for a towel and blocks plus essentials like keys and your phone. The material is sturdy yet easily packs away for storage. I love the blue print, it suits all seasons especially winter time.
customer_reviews.author: Lacey

customer_reviews.title: Great bag and cute
customer_reviews.text: I am taking a yoga teaching class and this has been used a ton and it is a great bag. Big enough to hold a few items during classes.
customer_reviews.author: LynnP

customer_reviews.title: I love this bag
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag,the colors are beautiful,the material is high quality,the craftsmanship is superb! Even the zipper is high quality. It is very roomy,it fits my yoga mat,water bottle,blanket and there is still extra room. It seems very well constructed. I feel like I got a lot for my money. It will not disappoint.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Honeycombe

customer_reviews.title: Making yoga chic
customer_reviews.text: Yet another 5-star reviewer here. I love this duffel. Very well made and gorgeous patterns. Never fails to get complimented. It fits my yoga mat, 2 blocks, strap and a towel with room to spare. Even with the addition of my phone, wallet and keys, there's still extra room. Zippers very securely, including an exterior zippered pocket.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best yoga mat carrier
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE my new yoga bag! The bag is roomy and it is easy to take my large mat in and out and there is still room for essentials such as blocks, strap and towel. The side pocket is great for phone and keys. The construction of the bag includes strong seams, excellent quality fabric and a sturdy zipper. I love the elephant print. It has been a pleasure doing business with this company and I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: dahlia

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy & Beautiful Yoga Mat Tote
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful well-built tote for my yoga mat and other items. I love that there is an outside pocket for small items, like keys and separate zippered small bag for other items, such as money, packet of Kleenex, personal items.
customer_reviews.author: A. G. Turek

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and not tacky!
customer_reviews.text: I took a long time to choose a yoga bag. After reading lots of reviews on different bags I decided to go with this one. PROS: Great quality, not tacky, very spacious (I can fit my manduka pro lite yoga mat and an extra outfit and running shoes and theres still room for more) One small con: It doesn't hold itself open, when you want to pack your things into it, you have to hold it open. Not enough of a con to take a star away though. Very happy with this product!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Papale

customer_reviews.title: Love this yoga bag
customer_reviews.text: Love this yoga bag. This is my 3rd bag, my mat is thick (Jade Fusion) and it fits perfectly in this one. It's so much easier to get in and out of this bag with the zippered top. I also like that I can keep my phone, keys, shoes, etc. all in the bag while taking class. I wish I had purchased this bag first:)) Oh, and it's also very pretty- I have had several people ask where I purchased. The company shipped the bag as stated and I received , i believe, a day earlier than expected. I would not hesitate to purchase from this company again.
customer_reviews.author: lisae174

customer_reviews.title: Very groovy
customer_reviews.text: Great bag. Roomy-can fit mat, two blocks and a blanket with ease. I get a lot of compliments on this bag
customer_reviews.author: Cristina D.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful bag! I had the traditional round bag but wanted a place for my wallet and keys. Also wanted to carry my own strap and block, sometimes the yoga studio is very busy and if you arrive too late you may not have props!
customer_reviews.author: sheila

customer_reviews.title: Optically impressive
customer_reviews.text: The design I chose visually impressive ....quilting of the material durability of the zippers impressive ......room inside does not give you the impression of cheaply made. Great quality for the price
customer_reviews.author: Puppy mom

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size.
customer_reviews.text: I was a little leary of the size, but this is perfect for my mat and workout clothes including my full size towel and bath kit.
customer_reviews.author: cyberlill

customer_reviews.title: Fits Manduka Pro Mat and my other yoga accessories.
customer_reviews.text: Holds all my yoga accessories and my Manduka Pro Yoga mat. Wish it was a tad longer but convenient bag grab and go.
customer_reviews.author: J. Buettler

customer_reviews.title: Quality Yoga Bag
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my wife to use with her 85” Manduka mat. It’s a bit tight with the extra long mat and doesn’t leave much room for blocks in the bag. Shouldn’t be an issue with a standard mat. She loves the quality of the bag and the separate wristlet that matches.
customer_reviews.author: Chase Pinchot

customer_reviews.title: This bag is amazing
customer_reviews.text: I really love this bag. It has lots of room for my thicker mat, weights and a block (only use one). I would only make one suggestion - a few more interior pockets to make containing by strap, hair ties and other small items easier.
customer_reviews.author: Marshfield Mom

customer_reviews.title: Roomy and easy to carry
customer_reviews.text: This sturdy bag carries my Manduca yoga mat, two blocks, and my knee pad. Works great! Easy to carry. Very attractive.
customer_reviews.author: GSP and Dane Lady

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product! Would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this Yoga duffel bag! Great Quality. It fits all of my yoga equipment. I just like how convenient it is to tote all my yoga equipment around now. The pattern was pretty. The description was perfect. I would definitely recommend. After I purchased it, my mom went and bought one too!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: super cute and practical, bought for my daughter and she totally loves it
customer_reviews.author: Susan W

customer_reviews.title: Great bag!
customer_reviews.text: It’s a nice bag. I have more props than really fit in it, but it’s still a great bag.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Thornton

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy (canvas) nice
customer_reviews.text: I expect this to last for many years. It is big enuf for for my stuff. It’s as long as a yoga mat. Nice zipper and little pocket for keys and maybe your phone, (on silent of course :). I do like it very much.
customer_reviews.author: cindy

customer_reviews.title: Cute yoga bag works well
customer_reviews.text: Use it daily fits my Manduka Pro easily but doesn’t hold my blocks. I can put my towel in it. I love the look and the zipper pocket to store my keys and credit card/iPhone
customer_reviews.author: HeatherH

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Love this bag. I can fit two yoga mats in here plus a small hand towel. The print is a bit darker than I expected but I think its actually a good thing because it still looks super clean and brand new.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Yoga mat bag beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Wish it was slightly bigger to allow the blocks in the bag without being tight. Love the color and quality. My yoga mat is 1/2 inch thick.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It’s a winner.
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this thing! Like it’s too pretty to hide in the closet. I keep it where it is visible and I’m always happy to see it. Also it’s a 10/10 in quality; very durable. And there is plenty of room for all sorts of things with the yoga mat in there.
customer_reviews.author: DanYelle

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Yoga duffle for years of use
customer_reviews.text: Super! Pleased with the stitching, roominess, and the pattern is even better in person.
customer_reviews.author: Rene K

customer_reviews.title: Great bag!
customer_reviews.text: This is a gorgeous bag and I can’t wait to use it during my practice as well as my upcoming yoga trip! Thank you again for the excellent customer service and extremely fast shipping!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer E Sinclair

customer_reviews.title: This is a beautiful Yoga bag
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful Yoga bag!!! I love the colors, the quality which is excellent and well worth the price. It is so roomy and I can 'haul' all my 'stuff' in it. I just love this and Kindfolk, you have excellent products! Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and well made
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves this bag! It holds her yoga mat, mat towel, hand towel, block, and roller. Very spacious. She has received a lot of compliments from others at the yoga studio and everyone wants to know where she got the bag. Very sturdy and well made. Main compartment has 2 zippers. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: KindfolkYogaMatDuffleBag
customer_reviews.text: I love this. It's sturdy with a long zipper and the patten is beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: C. Guidebeck

customer_reviews.title: One wash the vibrant colors are gone
customer_reviews.text: There was a bad smell that did not leave after 3 days of airing out so I washed it. The design still looks great, but it now looks old and faded. But, its still durable and the perfect size for a mat, blocks, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Zelle

customer_reviews.title: Best yoga bag!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this yoga bag!! It’s so cute, so durable, and so spacious.
customer_reviews.author: Sunny

customer_reviews.title: I love the bag
customer_reviews.text: I love the bag: great quality,sturdy handles and material as well as heavy duty zippers. My only issue and it is a personal one as I have an 8 mm yoga mat. The mat fits great in the bag along with water bottle and strap but I can only for one yoga block in not two. Doubt it would be a problem with a thinner mat.
customer_reviews.author: Jan E. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I get so many compliments on this Yoga bag! It's pretty and I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Terri

customer_reviews.title: Love this bag!
customer_reviews.text: I use this to hold all my yoga stuff. I have my mat, two blocks and a towel in there. It has made my trips to yoga class so much easier.
customer_reviews.author: Martha A. Baker

customer_reviews.title: Loving that I can lug my yoga stufd
customer_reviews.text: I have only used this yoga mat bag once but so far I really like it. The price was very reasonable and it arrived quickly. I like the print a lot. It fits my yoga mat with plenty of room to spare so I can stash my keys, phone, wallet, and water. I haven't seen any other bags like this at this price point so I'm very happy with my purchase. I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Luci Abrahamson

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and well made bag
customer_reviews.text: Such a beautiful bag and nice enough to use for a weekend trip and not just my yoga gear.
customer_reviews.author: KBennett

product_meta.title: Kindfolk Yoga Mat Duffle Bag Patterned Canvas with Pocket and Zipper
feature_bullets: HELP END SLAVERY WORLDWIDE - Kindfolk donates $1 for every unit sold to help end slavery and sex trafficking worldwide. Kindfolk is partnered with A21, a nonprofit who aims to reach, rescue and restore victims of slavery and to prevent this tragedy for future generations. When you shop with Kindfolk, you help to change the world.
FITS STANDARD SIZE & THICK MATS - This bag is 26" x 8" x 8" and will fit up to a 26" wide mat. Also, it is perfectly suited for extra thick mats
VEGAN & ENVIRONMENTALLY FRIENDLY - Kindfolk’s bags now use man-made leather, meaning it is animal-friendly and still as stylish as ever

EYE-CATCHING AND INCREDIBLY USEFUL - Bags can fit two small mats or any combination of blocks, straps, towels or other accessories. Outer pocket is perfect for keys, cell phone or other small personal items

PERFECT GIFT IDEA - These bags are incredibly well made and durable with high quality canvas - perfect for daily use. Whether you want to buy this as a gift for a fellow yogi or as something special for yourself, you won't be disappointed
